name: King Bit's MIZery
description:
King Bit is an evil human ruler over his lands. His mercyless units defeated every aspiring creature group. Now, your time has come to overthrow King Bit and take over his kingdom!

In King Bit's MIZery you take control over evil creatures, which you can create and equip with weapons and tools. With your troops you travel the lands of King Bit and defeat his army to take over his kingdom

King Bits MIZery was created during one week in around 34 hours for the MizJam1 GameJam hostet by Mizizizizizi (didn't count). There was no specific theme, but a certain assetpack had to be used.

Gameplay and Programming

DeagleDryan

Art

1Bit Pack by Kenney

Music and Sound

"Retro Forest" from David Fesliyan

Soundeffects were created in bfxr.
